item.title: Remembering the 20th Century Hotel & Casino: A Fleeting Flash of Vegas Glamour | Vintage Las Vegas
item.description:
A Brief Spark of Modernity: The 20th Century Hotel & Casino

The Las Vegas Strip is known for constant reinvention, but few properties exemplify this more dramatically than the site currently occupied by the OYO Hotel & Casino on Tropicana Avenue. From 1977 to 1979, it was briefly but memorably the 20th Century Hotel & Casino, a venture born from the ashes of a Howard Johnsonâ€™s motel and aimed at capturing the spirit of the mid-century modern aesthetic.
